_comment: Copy this file to agent-registry.json and fill in real values. agent-registry.json is gitignored â€” it contains secrets (openclaw_session_id).

agents._comment_agent_id: Unique identifier for this agent. Must match the agent name used in tmux session naming and OpenClaw routing.
agents._comment_enabled: Set to false to disable all hook event handling for this agent without removing the entry.
agents._comment_session_name: The tmux session name where Claude Code runs for this agent.
agents._comment_working_directory: Absolute path to the agent's workspace. Claude Code will be launched in this directory.
agents._comment_openclaw_session_id: OpenClaw session UUID used for gateway message delivery. Obtain from OpenClaw dashboard or API.
agents._comment_system_prompt_file: Path to the system prompt file, relative to the gsd-code-skill root directory. Used when launching Claude Code via bin/launch-session.mjs.
